amendment.description: To limit the amount available for the Urban Partnership Congestion Initiative under section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2859 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11405) To limit the amount available for the Urban Partnership Congestion Initiative under section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2859 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2859 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Shelby.
